title: Injury
effect: 4x Injury ➜ Unconscious.──Spend an action to recover or use an Asset to discard.

title: Distress
effect:
3x Distress ➜ Panic.
4x Distress ➜ Hopeless.──Use an action or an Asset to discard.

title: Dying
effect: 4x Injury: You cannot take actions until someone revives you. Check optional dying rules.──Heal your Injuries to discard.

title: Panicked
effect: 3x Distress: You can only play the top card of your Outcome deck.──Recover from your Distress to discard.

title: Hopeless
effect: 4x Distress: You can only flee or give up.──Recover from your Distress to discard.

title: Stuck
effect: You cannot move, but you can still take other actions.──Spend an action to free yourself to discard.

title: Hindered
effect: You can only move or take actions, but not both.──Spend an action to free yourself to discard.

title: Boost
effect: Your next action or defense has +1 Effect or +1 Move.

title: Complication
effect: A Complication makes your life harder.──Next action or defense has -1 Effect, then discard.

title: Freezing
effect: Every turn you end with 2x Freezing or more, you receive a Distress. Cancelled by Burning.──Use an action or an Asset to discard.

title: Burning
effect: Every turn you end with 2x Burning or more, you receive an Injury. Cancelled by Freezing.──Use an action or an Asset to discard.

title: Doom
effect: You are loosing your humanity.──3x Doom: You transform into a monster.

title: Salvation
effect: You are regaining your humanity.──3x Salvation: You transform back into a hero.
